ComicInfo.Penciller: Jeff Pittarelli,Jim Lee,Randy Queen,Jeff Pittarelli,Jim Lee,Randy Queen
ComicInfo.Summary: Ariel's father Robert, took her out of school in Fairfield three months before her highschool graduation and moved to Salem. The day before her first day at her new school she finds the only beautiful spot in the whole town to sit down and write in her diary. She writes about her old life and the complications that came with it. No friends, no boyfriend and an asshole for a father. She hopes that her remaining time in Salem high will bring a sense of peace and happiness to her life. Awish she finds unlikely to come true. Also among her diary entries, she writes about her nightmares, and the ever so powerful dragon Fang, and the mysterious bird that always comes to her rescue. Ariel goes to bed with the hope of a peaceful slumber and a brighter and better tomorrow.
